item.title: Exclusive: Education Department Investigates Maine For Hiding Gender Dysphoria From Parents
item.description: Schools allowing children to transition genders is a major gateway to pushing them toward genital mutilation and chemical castration.

item.title: 6 Unbelievably Scammy Federal Practices DOGE Staff Reveal In Fox Interview
item.description: 'If a commercial company operated the way the federal government does, then it would immediately go bankrupt ... the officers would be arrested.'

item.title: Republicans Hustle To Mobilize Early Voters Ahead Of Critical Wisconsin Supreme Court Race
item.description: Fresh off the presidential election, Wisconsin voters are again enduring political ads vigorous get-out-the-vote efforts.

item.title: Leftist WI Supreme Court Candidate Endorsed By Radical Tesla Protest Group
item.description: Trump-hating Indivisible is one of Crawford’s most gushing endorsers, and one of the left's most hostile Tesla/Musk protesters.

item.title: Nevada’s Elections Chief Won’t Say If He’s Probing Hundreds Of Allegedly Illegal 2024 Votes
item.description: 'Under the current circumstances, there's no reason anyone in Nevada should have any confidence that our elections are safe and secure.'
